content: barracuda hat mat kladney - 2020 @that hat over there gauge supplies needed skills needed 4 x4 stockinette 50y worsted weight yarn color a knitting in the round 22 5 row x 15 stitches 50y worsted weight yarn color b knit/purl/slip_stitch us 5-9 3 5-5 5mm 50y worsted weight yarn color c k2tog circs 16 / dpns 50y worsted weight yarn color d ​ ​ knitting notes this pattern uses the technique of mosaic knitting to create a faux brioche knit it works up twice as fast as brioche and looks just as good this is a great pattern for someone who wants to introduce colorwork into their knitting but haven t quite gotten the hang of fair isle - you only have to carry one color at a time so it is super easy mosaic knitting involves switching colors after every row it is quite simple - when you reach the end of one row just drop the yarn you are working on and pick up the other color you don t need to carry two yarns at once - just ignore the other yarn the only complicated thing with this pattern is the first two row in order to set up the mosaic knit you do not join the pattern until after you have knit the first two row what this means is that you will start ​ by casting on with color a then you will slide your work back and then work the second row with color b starting from the first stitch you casted on once you have completed the second row you will pick ​ ​ up color a again and join the work in the round by working the last stitch of row 2 barracuda hat mat kladney -
